header.title: Welcome to KEset
header.subtitle1: Correcting gibberish typing with a shortcut.
header.subtitle2: This extension helps you fix wrong-language typing instantly.

how.title: What does KEset actually do?
how.paragraph1: Ever typed something and realized your keyboard was set to the wrong language?
how.paragraph2: Instead of deleting and retyping, KEset lets you fix it instantly using a shortcut.

example.title: Example:
example.explanation: KEset will convert it back correctly with one click or shortcut.

limitations.title: Limitations:
list: Works best on standard Windows keyboards
Not tested on Mac or laptops

video.title: Watch the tutorial
video.description: See how KEset works in action:

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Does KEset change my system language?
faq.a1: No. It only corrects the typed text based on keyboard layout.
faq.a2: No. Everything happens locally in your browser.

contact.title: Need help?
contact.description: If you have questions, feedback, or need support, feel free to contact me at
